news.title: EV realism is here. How automakers react in 2026 will be telling
news.summary: Detroit automakers are refocusing on large gas-guzzling trucks and SUVs. Many have admitted that policies, not consumers, were driving the charge for EVs.

news.title: Novo Nordisk stock surges on hopes Wegovy pill approval will deliver some 'redemption' for investors
news.summary: The FDA on Monday approved the first-ever GLP-1 pill for weight loss from the Danish pharmaceutical giant. The pill was developed by the Danish company, which also makes the popular weight-loss drug Advil.

news.title: Hanwha Ocean shares jump 10% after Trump says South Korean firm to build warships for U.S. Navy
news.summary: Trump said that the frigates will be built at the Philadelphia shipyards. Hanwha had invested $5 billion into the shipyards, Trump said.

news.title: Gas prices fall to four-year lows as millions embark on holiday road trips
news.summary: The average price of unleaded gasoline in the U.S. is at its lowest since 2021, according to AAA. The average cost of a gallon of gas is now $2.36.

news.title: H-1B visa applicants face more disruptions amid social media checks and wage protection rules
news.summary: The U.S. administration has lined up a slew of actions to restrict the use of H-1B visas by businesses. The move is designed to boost the economy and create jobs.

news.title: China has been open to Western consumer brands for decades. Those brands still have a lot to learn about Chinese consumers.
news.summary: Global brands from Starbucks to Costa to Häagen-Dazs are scrambling to adapt. Domestic rivals are moving faster, consumers are trading down.

news.title: Quantum stocks are where AI was five years ago. These bets could be big winners.
news.summary: The Pentagon sees quantum computing as a new Manhattan Project. China is “nanoseconds’ behind. And these stocks are still cheap.

news.title: These are the catalysts to reignite stock market momentum in 2026, says UBS
news.summary: UBS Wealth Management has a 7,700 target for the S&P 500 by the end of 2026. The target is based on the current market value of the index.

news.title: Social Security says its phone service is getting better — but watchdogs warn callback wait times can run over an hour
news.summary: The Social Security Administration Office of Inspector General said the agency’s average speed of answer was only seven minutes in September. The average time it takes to answer a question is seven minutes.

news.title: ‘It’s a heavy, heavy load’ helping aging parents who live far away. Here’s how you can make it work.
news.summary: It takes travel, time and money to travel around the world. It also takes a lot of time to get there. It takes time, money and travel. It's not easy.
